title: Overview
description: A high-level introduction to the Ordinals Plus library, explaining its purpose for managing BTCO DIDs and DID Linked Resources on Bitcoin, and outlining its main components for developers.

title: Getting Started
description: Provides a step-by-step guide to installing the library and running a basic code example to create and resolve DIDs and resources, enabling developers to quickly start building.

title: Core Concepts
description: Explains the fundamental principles behind the Ordinals Plus library, including BTCO DIDs, Linked Resources, the transaction lifecycle, and the provider system.

title: BTCO DIDs
description: Details the structure and functionality of the `BtcoDid` class for creating, validating, and resolving BTCO Decentralized Identifiers on the Bitcoin blockchain.

title: Linked Resources
description: Covers how to work with DID Linked Resources using the `ResourceResolver`, including resolving content, collections, and handling different data providers like Ordiscan.

title: Transaction Lifecycle
description: Explains the two-phase commit/reveal transaction process for creating inscriptions, covering fee calculation, UTXO selection, signing, and broadcasting.

title: Verifiable Credentials (VCs)
description: Introduces the `VCService` for issuing and verifying W3C Verifiable Credentials for inscriptions, integrating with an external VC API.

title: API Reference
description: A comprehensive reference of all public classes, functions, and types exported by the Ordinals Plus library, organized by module.

title: DIDs
description: API documentation for DID-related functionalities, including the `BtcoDidResolver` and utility functions for creating and validating DIDs.

title: Resources
description: API documentation for the `ResourceResolver`, providers, and utility functions for working with DID Linked Resources.

title: Transactions
description: API documentation for creating, signing, and broadcasting commit and reveal transactions, including fee calculation and UTXO selection.

title: Key Management
description: API documentation for the `KeyManager` and related classes for generating, storing, and managing cryptographic keys.

title: Verifiable Credentials
description: API documentation for the `VCService`, types, and formatters for creating and verifying W3C Verifiable Credentials.

title: Indexer
description: API documentation for the `OrdinalsIndexer` client, used for querying inscription data from an indexer service.

title: Utilities
description: API documentation for various utility functions, including address handling, CBOR, PSBT manipulation, and error handling.

title: Development & Contribution
description: A guide for developers who want to contribute to the Ordinals Plus library, covering setup, building, running tests, and linting.

title: Changelog
description: A detailed history of all notable changes, feature additions, and bug fixes for each version of the Ordinals Plus library.
